Package suncertify.db

Interface Summary
DB This interface as required has functions which is meant to be implemented by the Data class file
URLyBirdDataManager This interface is designed to have added function required to manage the database smoothly.
 

Class Summary
Data This is the Data file required to manage/implement DB interface of the specification given which handles the various manipulation of the database record
DatabaseManager This Class Manages the Database, implementing new functions in the URLyBirdDataManager interface for data access flexibility and extensibility to Manage the database records
DBDataModel This Object is the model for the database file record, it interacts with the Database file directly.
 

Exception Summary
DuplicateKeyException This handles Exception when the a Newly added record have same Hotel Name and Location which is flagged ACTIVE in the database record.
InvalidFieldLengthException This handles Exception that occurs when the new value length thats about to inserted into a database field is not more than the required length thats in the database schema
InvalidRecordException If new Record thats about to be added is incomplete i.e necessary fields required is left out empty
RecordNotFoundException When the record/row thats been looked for cannot be found in the database record
